privacy.title: Your privacy matters

dataCollection.title: What we collect
dataCollection.description: Only the information you provide in the contact form: your name, email, and message. No tracking, no analytics, no third-party data collection.

purpose.title: Why we collect it
purpose.description: Solely to respond to your inquiry and establish professional communication. Your data is transmitted securely via EmailJS and not stored on our servers.

sharing.title: Who we share with
sharing.description: Nobody. Your information is private and confidential. We never share, sell, or distribute your personal data to third parties.

retention.title: How long we keep it
retention.description: Your email is processed immediately and only retained in my personal email for communication purposes. You can request deletion at any time.

privacy.rights: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time. Contact me to exercise these rights.

contact.description: This website provides a contact form for professional inquiries. By using the contact form, you agree to provide accurate information and consent to the processing of your data as described in our privacy policy.
